Module help
Package help

Class ScheduleController

java.lang.Object
help.ScheduleController
public class ScheduleController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling the logic related to managing the schedule of movies and sessions.

  • Method Details

    • handleCloseButtonAction

      private void handleCloseButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action for the Close button. Closes the current stage/window.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the Close button click.

    • handleMinimizeButtonAction

      private void handleMinimizeButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action for the Minimize button. Minimizes the current stage/window.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the Minimize button click.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the UI components such as ComboBoxes, TableView, and populates the ComboBoxes with values. Also sets up the columns in the TableView.

    • OnAdd

      void OnAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action of adding a new session to the schedule. Validates the input fields and calls the database handler to add the session to the database.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the Add button click.

    • onUpdate

      void onUpdate(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action of updating an existing session. Validates the input fields, retrieves the selected session from the TableView, and calls the database handler to update the session in the database.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the Update button click.

    • OnDelete

      void OnDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action of deleting an existing session. Displays a confirmation alert before proceeding with deletion.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the Delete button click.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String content)
      Displays an alert with the specified type, title, and content. The alert is modal and will block user interaction with the main window until dismissed.
      Parameters:
      alertType - The type of the alert (e.g., INFORMATION, WARNING, ERROR).
      title - The title of the alert.
      content - The content/message of the alert.

    • clearFields

      private void clearFields()
      Clears all input fields in the UI. Resets the movie title field, hall combo box, date picker, and time field.

    • loadSessionsFromDatabase

      private void loadSessionsFromDatabase()
      Loads all session data from the database and updates the session list. Catches and prints any SQLException that may occur.

    • onRowSelect

      private void onRowSelect(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the row selection in the session table and updates the input fields with the selected session's data.
      Parameters:
      event - The MouseEvent triggered by the row click.

    • onOrganizeMovie

      public void onOrganizeMovie(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the event when the "Organize Movie" button is clicked. Loads and changes the scene to the "Organize Movie" screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error loading the FXML file.

    • onCancellationsRefunds

      public void onCancellationsRefunds(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the event when the "Cancellations and Refunds" button is clicked. Loads and changes the scene to the cancellations and refunds screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error loading the FXML file.

    • onsignOut

      public void onsignOut(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the event when the "Sign Out" button is clicked. Loads the login screen and changes the scene.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error loading the FXML file.

    • changeScene

      private void changeScene(javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.Parent root, String newSceneTitle)
      Helper function to change the current scene. Updates the scene root, title, and fullscreen status of the stage.
      Parameters:
      stage - The current stage.
      root - The new root of the scene.
      newSceneTitle - The title for the new scene.

    • handleSignOutButtonAction

      private void handleSignOutButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action for the Sign Out button. Loads the login screen and changes the scene to "Login".
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.
